NoticeData.Contents: # Event Dungeon – Ruby Dust Vault - A special 20-floor event dungeon will run for four weeks. - You can earn a variety of hammers and dust (over 3,000 rubydusts in total). - In this event dungeon, every play will 100% drop both Hourglasses and Ruby Dust. # Nine Chronicles Universe - The Nine Chronicles IP will now officially serve as a hub connecting various types of content. - The primary goal of the Nine Chronicles Universe projects is to increase playtime for Nine Chronicles players. - It will also serve as a gateway to introduce and connect Nine Chronicles and NCG through various external channels. - The first official project, Petpop, will soon launch a new season where players can earn NCG as rewards. - For more detailed guidance on NCU, please refer to the link below. # Game Improvements - Mythic-Grade Item Synthesis - 1:1 exchange between Mythic-grade items is now supported. - *Note: This ratio is temporary and will later be adjusted to a standard 2:1 exchange.* - Guaranteed Results for Multiple Summons - 10x and 110x summons now come with a guaranteed results system, offering different grades and quantities depending on summon currency and type. - *The guaranteed rewards may change depending on event operations.* - Dormant Account Deletion and Recovery Flow - Starting from April 2025, account data of users who have not logged in since before that time will be deleted. - The contents of some package products have been updated with adjusted quantities.

- Adventure Boss Floors 21–30 Added - First-clear exclusive Yggdrasil stat runes for upper-tier Adventure Boss floors updated. - Four types of Mythic-grade runes have been added, each appearing according to the type of Adventure Boss. - Rune Updates - Balance adjustments to existing runes. - Stat balance for almost existing runes has been adjusted between 2x and 20x. - Many lower-grade and stat runes have been significantly boosted. - NCG consumption for enhancing the basic Adventurer’s Rune has been changed to 0. - Four new Mythic-grade runes added. - Four new Mythic-grade runes have been added to Rune Summoning. - To ensure balance stability, Mythic-grade runes have a maximum level cap of 150. - Three New Mythic-grade Costumes Added - The companion Dag has been added to the Water-element Ran costume. - Two costumes have been added to commemorate the winners of each quarter’s championship. - Once the winner of the current Heimdall Championship is decided, the costumes will be renamed after the Odin and Heimdall winners. - The concept is to honor the warriors whom Freyja guides to Valhalla for Ragnarok. - This costume can only be obtained through Summon and Fusion until version 200380, when the next Championship winners of the new Odin and Heimdall emerge. - Game Improvement - Fixed connection issue on mobile version during node failures.

World 9: Second-Half Update - Stages 431–450 added - The final stages of the regular World 9 have been released. - 10 Mythic-grade gear pieces added: 5 Earth-attribute and 5 Wind-attribute. - 20 stage quests (for 431–450) and 10 equipment-crafting quests added. - World 9 Dialog Added - The final chapter of the main scenario unfolds across Stages 401–450. Change to Mobile Login Methods - On first login in the mobile version, you will no longer be able to sign in via Twitter or Discord. - This will be applied to the Apple M build first. Apple K and Android M/K will adopt the change starting with the next update. Improvements - Adventure Boss bounty distribution updated - Before: 15% to slayers, 80% to staking users, 5% to a random single player. - Now: 30% to slayers, 65% to staking users, 5% to a random single player. - A Planetarium account will distribute at least 200,000 NCG per chain as bounty—your interest and participation are appreciated. - Item-related storage improvements - Improved the blockchain storage model for items, skills, and stats. - Adjusted the required CP for sweeps on stages 401–430. - The CP needed to perform sweeps on stages 401–430 has been reduced. - Mythic-grade costume “Skuld” added - Skuld is now included in Summon and Synthesis targets. - 27 new Collections - 2 Skuld-related collections. - 10 “no-skill” collections for World 9 Normal, Fire, and Water attribute gear. - 15 Dust/Item collections: 5 Ruby Dust, 5 Emerald Dust, 5 Golden Meat. - Stage dialog display order changed - Before: shown after the stage result popup. - Now: shown before the stage result popup. - Costume Summon probability info popup order changed - Now sorted in descending order from higher grade to lower grade. - Settings - Removed the Redeem Code button.
